Uses of Interface
Catalano.MachineLearning.IExplorationPolicy

  • Packages that use IExplorationPolicy 
    Package Description
    Catalano.MachineLearning
    The Catalano.MachineLearning namespace contains interfaces and classes for different algorithms of machine learning.

    • Uses of IExplorationPolicy in Catalano.MachineLearning

      Classes in Catalano.MachineLearning that implement IExplorationPolicy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BoltzmannExploration
      The class implements exploration policy base on Boltzmann distribution.
      class  EpsilonGreedyExploration
      The class implements epsilon greedy exploration policy.
      class  RouletteWheelExploration
      The class implements roulette whell exploration policy.
      class  TabuSearchExploration
      Tabu search exploration policy.
      Methods in Catalano.MachineLearning that return IExplorationPolicy 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IExplorationPolicy TabuSearchExploration.getBasePolicy()
      Base exploration policy.
      IExplorationPolicy QLearning.getExplorationPolicy()
      Exploration policy.
      IExplorationPolicy Sarsa.getExplorationPolicy()
      Exploration policy.
      Methods in Catalano.MachineLearning with parameters of type IExplorationPolicy 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void TabuSearchExploration.setBasePolicy(IExplorationPolicy basePolicy)
      Base exploration policy.
      void QLearning.setExplorationPolicy(IExplorationPolicy explorationPolicy)
      Policy, which is used to select actions.
      void Sarsa.setExplorationPolicy(IExplorationPolicy explorationPolicy)
      Exploration policy.
      Constructors in Catalano.MachineLearning with parameters of type IExplorationPolicy 
      Constructor and Description
      QLearning(int states, int actions, IExplorationPolicy explorationPolicy, boolean randomize)
      Initializes a new instance of the QLearning class.

      Initializes a new instance of the Sarsa class.

      Initializes a new instance of the TabuSearchExploration
